column5: When we get to the border and declare that we have alcohol on board, does Mike's Hard Lemonade classify as a beer or liquor. The only reason I ask is that the 2 different items have different quantities that can be brought across the border duty free. I'm tired of waiting, let cross the border and go fishing.
It is considered liquor and not beer so you will have to pay a duty above and beyond the allowed hard liquor amount.
